title: An Ning - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Caring Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Coma   Coming of Age   Disabilities   Hospital   Modern Day   Prison   Seme Protagonist   Sickly Characters

description:
A story of maturing side by side.

A story of you and I striving for a life together.

A story of cherishing you and accompanying you for an entire lifetime.

Once I grab hold of your hand, I will not let go again.>
